The Commission's public hearing on the proposed development agreement shall be conducted in accordance with the procedure for the conduct of reclassification hearings as provided in Subsections (b) and (c) of Section 
306.4 of the City Planning Code. Such public hearing on the proposed development agreement shall be held prior to or concurrently with the public hearing for consideration of any other Commission action deemed necessary to the approval or implementation of the proposed development agreement, unless the Commission determines, after a duly noticed public hearing pursuant to Section 
56.8, that proceeding in a different manner would further the public interest; provided, however, that any required action under the California Environmental Quality Act shall not be affected by this Section. 
(Added by Ord. 372-88, App. 8/10/88)
